# addedTasks

**Instance Property**

The tasks that you added to the task list.

## Declaration

```swift
var addedTasks: [INTask]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set this property to an array of [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INTask] objects, each of which represents a single task that you added.

## Providing the Task Information

- **modifiedTaskList**: The task list that you modified.

items.description: The task list that you modified.
